mng: horse, horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess, knight in Western chess
surname Ma, abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]

exm.mng: at once, right away, immediately, on horseback (i.e. by military force)
figurines of warriors and horses buried with the dead, Terracotta Army (historic site)
lit. spider's thread and horse track, tiny hints (of a secret), traces, clue
to get on a horse, to mount
